opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of July, 2012, the Court being evenly divided, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
Justice ORIE MELVIN did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Stuart Lee Knade, PA School Boards Association, Inc., for Amicus Curiae Pennsylvania School Boards Association.
